title: Optima nova
content:
**[Indicies](http://web.archive.org/web/20150324235817/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indicies) : [Typefaces](http://web.archive.org/web/20150324235817/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Typefaces) : Optima nova**

A complete redrawing, revision, and extension of [Optima](http://web.archive.org/web/20150324235817/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Optima), one of [Hermann Zapf](http://web.archive.org/web/20150324235817/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Hermann%20Zapf)'s most successful typefaces, released by [Linotype](http://web.archive.org/web/20150324235817/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Linotype) in 2002. Designed by Hermann Zapf and [Akira Kobayashi](http://web.archive.org/web/20150324235817/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Akira%20Kobayashi).

The Linotype website has complete overviews of the [original Optima type family](http://web.archive.org/web/20150324235817/http:/www.linotype.com/1305/optima-family.html), as well as the [Optima nova fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150324235817/http:/www.linotype.com/54142/optimanova-family.html).
author: dan_reynolds
